DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect habituation diet different type dietary fat ( stearic , palmitic oleic ) select Cardiovascular Disease ( CVD ) risk indicator emphasis inflammation .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Dietary Fatty Acids Cardiovascular Disease Risk Indicators Inflammation
DOC.detailed_description: Vegetable oil high specific fatty acids interest - stearic ( find cocoa butter , meat ) , palmitic ( found meat , dairy plant oil ) stearic acid 's metabolic product , oleic ( found olive corn oil ) - use displace standardize diet fed mildly hypercholesterolemic postmenopausal woman use randomized-controlled crossover design . A critical issue remain unresolved - relative comparability among . The finding research study enable u understand mechanism potential health effect different type fat . Each diet phase 5 week length 2-4 week break phase . All food drink provide study volunteer . Blood pressure body weight monitor per week adjustment make , necessary , maintain stable weight . During 5th week diet phase , volunteer come center 3 consecutive day provide fast blood sample non-fasting blood sample .
DOC.criteria: The inclusion exclusion criterion study A B identical . Postmenopausal woman ( menopause define complete natural cessation menses > 12 month bilateral oophorectomy ) . Age > 50 < 85 year BMI > 20 < 35 kg/m2 LDLcholesterol > 100 mg/dL CRP < 10 ug/dL Normal fast plasma glucose level ( < 120 mg/dL ) Not take medication know affect lipid metabolism : HMGCoA reductase inhibitor ( statin ) Bile Acid Sequestrants ( Cholestyramine , Colestipol , Colesevelam , etc . ) Cholesterol Absorption Inhibitors ( Ezetimibe [ Zetia ] ) Nicotinic Acid Agents ( Niacin , Niacor , SloNiacin , etc ) Fibrates ( Gemfibrozil , Clofibrate , Ciprofibrate , Fenofibrate [ Tricor ] , etc ) Probucol Anticoagulants ( Coumadin , Heparin , Plavix , etc ) Hormone therapy medication contain estrogen Acetylsalicylic acid contain medication , aspirin Diphenylhydantoin Supplements contain fatty acid ( Fish Oil , Flaxseed , etc . ) compound affect lipid metabolism ( red yeast rice , etc . ) least 3 month prior participation study Anabolic steroids Hydrocortisone Normal kidney function assess serum creatinine blood urea nitrogen Normal liver function assess serum glutamic pyruvic transaminase , serum glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase alkaline phosphatase Normal thyroid function assess serum TSH Normal gastrointestinal function Normotensive medication Nonsmoker least 2 year Alcohol intake < 7 drink per week , willingness abstain consume alcohol participate study . Consistent physical activity Willingness follow protocol detail Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) approve consent form . Exclusion criterion : Men Women double mastectomy Age < 50 > 85 year BMI < 20 > 35 kg/m2 LDLcholesterol < 100 mg/dL CRP > 10 ug/dL Abnormal fasting plasma glucose level > 120 mg/dL Use medication know affect lipid metabolism : HMGCoA reductase inhibitor ( statin ) Bile Acid Sequestrants ( Cholestyramine , Colestipol , Colesevelam , etc . ) Cholesterol Absorption Inhibitors ( Ezetimibe [ Zetia ] ) Nicotinic Acid Agents ( Niacin , Niacor , SloNiacin , etc ) Fibrates ( Gemfibrozil , Clofibrate , Ciprofibrate , Fenofibrate [ Tricor ] , etc ) Anticoagulants ( Coumadin , Heparin , Plavix , etc ) Hormone therapy medication contain estrogen Probucol Acetylsalicylic acid contain medication , aspirin Diphenylhydantoin Supplements contain fatty acid ( Fish Oil , Flaxseed , etc . ) compound affect lipid metabolism ( red yeast rice , etc . ) last 3 month prior participation study Anabolic steroids hydrocortisone Renal kidney disease , define history chronic kidney disease glomerular filtration rate < 60 ml.min/1.73 m2 calculate screen blood test . Hypothyroidism hyperthyroidism , define screen TSH outside normal range ( < 0.4 > 4.5 ) , unless control medication least 6 month Gastrointestinal disease Uncontrolled hypertension high BP reading discretion study physician nurse Established cardiovascular disease define history myocardial infarction , stroke , heart failure , coronary artery bypass graft , stenosis > 50 % , angina peripheral arterial disease ) Anemia , define screen haemoglobin < 11.7g/dL . Liver disease , define history chronic hepatitis B C , cholestatic cirrhotic liver disease , nonalcoholic fatty liver disease , elevation SGPT SGOT great 1.5 time upper limit normal screening , bilirubin great 2 mg/dL ( absence benign cause elevate bilirubin Gilbert 's syndrome ) screening , albumin low limit normal . Type I II diabetes Any nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAID ) antihistamine use subject 72 hour prior blood draw Smoking use nicotinecontaining product within past 2 year Alcohol intake > 7 drink per week unwillingness abstain consume alcohol participate study Unwillingness maintain body weight participation study Unwillingness adhere diet study protocol Weight gain loss 15 lb within 6 month prior enrollment Vegetarians food allergy aversion NonEnglish speak subject No Social Security number Women history difficulty blood draw Blood donation within past 8 week
